title: Sri Lanka schedules 6.5 hours of power cuts from April 6-8
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Power cuts of up to 6.5 hours have been approved in Sri Lanka from April 06 to April 08, Public Utilities Commission Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said as severe foreign exchange shortages to import fuel were temporarily eased with fuel on borrowed money from India.
Areas A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K and L will have power cuts of 4 hours from 8.00 am to 5.00 pm and 2.5 hours from 5.00 pm to 10.00pm.
Areas P,Q,R,S,T,U,V and W areas will have power cuts of 4 hours from 10.00am to 6.00pm and 2.5 hour power cuts from 6.00 pm to 11. 00 pm.
Download the power cut schedule from here:Demand Managmet Schedule-05-08th April 2022
Sri Lanka’s electricity demand had risen amid power cuts with more people using electricity for cooking and a delay in raising prices. (Colombo/April 5/2022)
